item.description:
Click Here to Learn More

Two Powerful Women will Share their Stories and their Deals

Our mystery Guest speaker was featured on CNN News, rehabbing a property and she arrive at the job site... in her Best Suit... No... not her blue jeans! We'll have the video... "profited $92,00" on just ONE of her deals!

Cecilia Faraci, is the Northeast Business Development Manager for Intuit, the maker of QuickBooks software. Cecilia is a graduate student of the CT REIA coaching program. She will teacher you... How to take action and how she purchased all her buildings "very creatively". Cecilia maintains a full time job, where she incurs a great deal of traveling. An avid skier, recently purchased & rehabbed a ski house in VT. and finds time to take "way too many" vacations!

And... the latest 2013 Real Estate News

We Will Award the 2013 Real Estate Woman of the Year Tonight!

Also... Guest appearances from our 2011 and 2012 "Real Estate Women of the Year" Winners! They Own...Hundreds of buildings!

Network with other women real estate investors in Connecticut

The Women Real Estate Investors Association, or WREIA, is an organization designed specifically for women to educate, empower and encourage women to invest in real estate. WREIA is one of country's fastest growing and premier real estate investor associations, promoting real estate investment, responsible property and project management, and using sound, ethical business practices.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Women Real Estate Investors In Connecticut Meeting
